column4: hmm wish my luck, trying to replace my windows work station with linux, see if I can keep it up
really worried about some of the things I do, lot of MSSQL & Visio, think I can handle the rest of the junk but those 2 things worry me a bit.
installing wine that is.  and I'm not sure how libre office spreadsheet will play with ODBC type things
LibreOffice supports ODBC, and I think there's a draw program, but not sure how vast it is compared to Visio
